data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The earned value model may be of use in each of the various stages of each capstone project. In ____ initiation ____, ____ intended ____ of ____ project ____ the ____ could ____ used ____ communication ____ client, students ____ supervisors. It is hoped that this positioning will provide a common understanding of the benefits of the proposed development.
data.partBlankContent: The earned value model may be of use in each of the various stages of each capstone project. In t__ initiation st___, t__ intended posit______ of t__ project o_ the mo___ could b_ used i_ communication bet____ client, students a__ supervisors. data.fullContent: The earned value model may be of use in each of the various stages of each capstone project. In the initiation stage, the intended positioning of the project on the model could be used in communication between client, students and supervisors. It is hoped that this positioning will provide a common understanding of the benefits of the proposed development.
data.answer: 挣值模型可能在每个顶石项目的每个不同阶段都有用。在项目启动阶段，项目在模型上的预期定位可以用于客户、学生和导师之间的沟通。希望这一定位将使人们对拟议的发展的好处有一个共同的了解。
